message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thanks Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I'm only willing to go up to $75 at this point. What do you say?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $100. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm ready to pay $80, which is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal!
